text: 5 Unexpected Valentine ’ s Day Outfit Ideas — No Lace Required Sexy doesn ’ t always have to include something sheer, lace or underwear as outerwear. We get it — on Valentine ’ s Day, you want to flaunt what your mama gave ya.
